Locations.Name: Graveyard Entrance
Locations.Description: The archway to enter the graveyard rests behind you

Locations.Name: The Mausoleum
Locations.Description: You are in the Mausoleum. There's a lot of rich dead people here

Locations.Name: West-Side Lot
Locations.Description: You have entered Graveyard Lot A. It is quiet ... too quiet. Most of the headstones here are simple and crumbling, many unmarked. It feels like this is where the cemetery puts those it wants to forget. A few scattered offerings have long since withered away.

Locations.Name: East-Side Lot
Locations.Description: You have entered Graveyard Lot B.The graves are newer, and many are decorated with trinkets, wreaths, and faded cards. It feels like the dead here haven’t been forgotten, not yet...

Locations.Name: Graveyard Grounds
Locations.Description: The brisk air outside makes you feel cold.
